message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to make you a special offer at $18,000.  Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $18,000 is out of my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $10,000. Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your budget limit, but $18,000 is closer to my bottom line. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $14,000, but I'm still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to go up to $11,000. Let's see if we can find a solution that works for both of us.
